name: unrevealed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not revealed (= made known or shown): Some details are unrevealed. An unrevealed number of staff have been disciplined. Synonyms
secret
undisclosed
More examplesFewer examplesThey are secrets that, by his own admission, the chairman would rather were left unrevealed.There are bound to have been other shocking incidences of waste as yet unrevealed. A wholesaler sells goods to retailers at a price which includes an unrevealed margin.There had to be unrevealed deals to secure testimony, even though they repeatedly denied it.
